1#ifndef MPM_PARTICLE_SPECS_H_

9using namespace amrex;
10
11struct realData
12{
13 enum
14 { // Particle data stored in p.m_data
15 radius=0,
16 xvel=1,
17 yvel=2,
18 zvel=3,
19 xvel_prime=4, //For position update. Check the review paper page 34
20 yvel_prime=5,
21 zvel_prime=6,
22 strainrate=7, //4
23 strain=13, //10
24 stress=19, //16
25 deformation_gradient=25, //22
26 volume=34, //31
27 mass=35, //32
28 density=36, //33
29 jacobian=37, //34
30 pressure=38, //35
31 vol_init=39, //36
32 E=40, //37
33 nu=41, //38
34 Bulk_modulus=42, //39
35 Gama_pressure=43, //40
36 Dynamic_viscosity=44, //41
37 yacceleration=45, //45 This is for storing the acceleration of each particle in the y-direction. This variable is not generic and used only for the spring-mass and membrane simulations only
38 count
39 };
40};
41
42struct intData
43{
44 enum
45 {
46 phase = 0,
47 rigid_body_id,
48 constitutive_model,
49 count
50 };
51};
52
53struct Rigid_Bodies
54{
55 int Rigid_Body_Id;
56 int num_of_mp;
57 amrex::Real total_mass;
58 amrex::Real total_volume;
59 Array <amrex::Real,AMREX_SPACEDIM> gravity;
60 Array <amrex::Real,AMREX_SPACEDIM> force_external;
61 Array <amrex::Real,AMREX_SPACEDIM> force_internal;
62 Array <amrex::Real,AMREX_SPACEDIM> velocity;
63 Array <amrex::Real,AMREX_SPACEDIM> imposed_velocity;
64 amrex::Real Damping_Coefficient;
65 //Body forces
66 int position_update_method; //0-->Constant Velocity 1-->Particle dynamics solver
67 bool enable_weight;
68 bool enable_damping_force;
69};
70
71
72
73class MPMspecs
74{
75 public:
76
77 Array<Real,AMREX_SPACEDIM> plo{AMREX_D_DECL(0.0, 0.0, 0.0)};
78 Array<Real,AMREX_SPACEDIM> phi{AMREX_D_DECL(0.0, 0.0, 0.0)};
79 Array<int,AMREX_SPACEDIM> ncells{AMREX_D_DECL(0, 0, 0)};
80 GpuArray<int,AMREX_SPACEDIM> periodic{AMREX_D_DECL(0, 0, 0)};
81 Array<Real,AMREX_SPACEDIM> gravity{AMREX_D_DECL(0.0, -ACCG, 0.0)};
82
83 Array<Real,AMREX_SPACEDIM> force_slab_lo{AMREX_D_DECL(0.0, 0.0, 0.0)};
84 Array<Real,AMREX_SPACEDIM> force_slab_hi{AMREX_D_DECL(0.0, 0.0, 0.0)};
85 Array<Real,AMREX_SPACEDIM> extforce{AMREX_D_DECL(0.0, 0.0, 0.0)};
86
87 Real timestep=0.0;
88 int num_redist=10;
89 int max_grid_size=8;
90 Real final_time;
91 Real write_output_time;
92 Real screen_output_time;
93 int maxsteps=1;
94 std::string particlefilename;
95 std::string restart_checkfile;
96
97 //Output parameters
98 std::string prefix_particlefilename = "plt";
99 std::string prefix_gridfilename = "plt";
100 std::string prefix_densityfilename = "plt";
101 std::string prefix_checkpointfilename = "chk";
102 int num_of_digits_in_filenames=6;
103
104 //Diagnostic parameters
105 int print_diagnostics=0;
106 int ifrigidnodespresent=0;
107 bool is_standard_test = true;
108 int test_number = 0; //0->is_standard_test=false,1-->axial vibration of bar, 2-->Dam break, 3--> Elastic collision of disks, 4--> Lateral deflection of beam
109 int no_of_rigidbodies_present=0;
110 amrex::Real total_mass_phase_0=0.0;
111 amrex::Real total_vol_phase_0=0.0;
112
113 //Rigid body nodes
114 Rigid_Bodies *Rb;
115
116 //Parameters for Axial bar test
117 amrex::Real axial_bar_E = 100.0;
118 amrex::Real axial_bar_rho = 1.0;
119 amrex::Real axial_bar_L = 25.0;
120 int axial_bar_modenumber = 1;
121 amrex::Real axial_bar_v0 = 0.1;
122
123 //Parameters for dam break
124 amrex::Real dam_break_H1 = 0.2;
125 amrex::Real dam_break_g = ACCG;
126
127 //Parameters for lateral vibration of bar (TVB). The test case is performed for first mode
128 amrex::Real tvb_E = 50.0;
129 amrex::Real tvb_L = 0.1;
130 amrex::Real tvb_rho = 25.0;
131 amrex::Real tvb_v0 = 0.0;
132
133 amrex::Real p2g_L = 1.0;
134 amrex::Real p2g_f = 1.0;
135 int p2g_ncell=0;
136
137 //Parameters for membrane compaction
138 amrex::Real mem_compaction_area=1.0;
139 amrex::Real mem_compaction_dampcoeff=1.0;
140 amrex::Real mem_compaction_L0=1.0;
141 int mem_compaction_restoring_force_calc_method = 1;
142
143 //Parameters for spring alone simulation
144 amrex::Real spring_alone_area = 0.1;
145 amrex::Real spring_alone_length = 0.0;
146 amrex::Real spring_alone_E = 0.0;
147 amrex::Real spring_alone_exact_deflection = 0.0;
148 amrex::Real spring_alone_exact_delta = 0.0;
149
150
151 //1-->tent function, 3--> cubic spline shape function
152 int order_scheme=1;
153
154 Real applied_strainrate=0.0;
155 Real applied_strainrate_time=0.0;
156 int phasefield_output=0;
157 int phasefield_gridratio=1;
158 Real phasefield_smoothfactor=1.0;
159 int external_loads_present=0.0;
160 int fixed_timestep = 0; //Use fixed time step provided by user if this flag is 1
161 Real dt_max_limit=1e0;
162 Real dt_min_limit=1e-12;
163 Real CFL=0.1;
164 Real mass_tolerance = 1e-8;
165 Real alpha_pic_flip = 0.95;
166 Real total_mass = 0.0;
167 Real total_rigid_mass = 0.0;
168 Real total_vol = 0.0;
169 Real mem_compaction_vnew=0.0;
170 Real mem_compaction_vold=0.0;
171 int stress_update_scheme=1;
172 int calculate_strain_based_on_delta=0;
173
174
175 Vector<int> bclo;
176 Vector<int> bchi;
177
178 GpuArray<int,AMREX_SPACEDIM> order_scheme_directional{AMREX_D_DECL(1,1,1)};
179
180
181 int use_autogen=0;
182 Vector<Real> autogen_mincoords;
183 Vector<Real> autogen_maxcoords;
184 Vector<Real> autogen_vel;
185 int autogen_multi_part_per_cell=1;
186 Real autogen_dens=1000.0;
187 int autogen_constmodel=1;
188 Real autogen_E=1e9;
189 Real autogen_nu=0.1;
190 Real autogen_bulkmod=0.0;
191 Real autogen_Gama_pres=1.4;
192 Real autogen_visc=0.001;
193
194 int levelset_bc=1; //no slip wall
195 Real levelset_wall_mu=0.1;
196
197
198 Array<Real,AMREX_SPACEDIM> wall_mu_lo{AMREX_D_DECL(0.1, 0.1, 0.1)};
199 Array<Real,AMREX_SPACEDIM> wall_mu_hi{AMREX_D_DECL(0.1, 0.1, 0.1)};
200
201 Array<Real,AMREX_SPACEDIM*AMREX_SPACEDIM> wall_vel_lo{0.0};
202 Array<Real,AMREX_SPACEDIM*AMREX_SPACEDIM> wall_vel_hi{0.0};
203
204 Real levset_mu=0.1;
205
206 void read_mpm_specs()
207 {
208 bclo.resize(AMREX_SPACEDIM);
209 bchi.resize(AMREX_SPACEDIM);
210
211
212 autogen_mincoords.resize(AMREX_SPACEDIM);
213 autogen_maxcoords.resize(AMREX_SPACEDIM);
214 autogen_vel.resize(AMREX_SPACEDIM);
215
216 ParmParse pp1("amr");
217 restart_checkfile="";
218 pp1.query("restart_checkfile",restart_checkfile);
219
220 ParmParse pp("mpm");
221 pp.get("prob_lo",plo);
222 pp.get("prob_hi",phi);
223 pp.get("ncells", ncells);
224 Array<int,AMREX_SPACEDIM> periodicarr{AMREX_D_DECL(0, 0, 0)};
225 pp.get("is_it_periodic",periodicarr);
226 periodic={AMREX_D_DECL(periodicarr[XDIR],periodicarr[YDIR],periodicarr[ZDIR])};
227 pp.get("max_grid_size", max_grid_size);
228
229 pp.get("max_steps", maxsteps);
230 pp.get("final_time",final_time);
231
232 pp.query("gravity", gravity);
233 pp.query("calculate_strain_based_on_delta",calculate_strain_based_on_delta);
234
235 write_output_time=final_time/10.0;
236 pp.query("write_output_time", write_output_time);
237
238 screen_output_time=write_output_time/10.0;
239 pp.query("screen_output_time", screen_output_time);
240
241 pp.query("num_redist", num_redist);
242
243 pp.query("use_autogen",use_autogen);
244
245 //Read output parameters
246 pp.query("prefix_particlefilename",prefix_particlefilename);
247 pp.query("prefix_gridfilename",prefix_gridfilename);
248 pp.query("prefix_densityfilename",prefix_densityfilename);
249 pp.query("prefix_checkpointfilename",prefix_checkpointfilename);
250 pp.query("num_of_digits_in_filenames",num_of_digits_in_filenames);
251
252 //Reading diagnostic parameters
253 pp.query("is_standard_test",is_standard_test);
254 pp.query("test_number",test_number);
255 pp.query("axial_bar_E",axial_bar_E);
256 pp.query("axial_bar_rho",axial_bar_rho);
257 pp.query("axial_bar_L",axial_bar_L);
258 pp.query("axial_bar_modenumber",axial_bar_modenumber);
259 pp.query("axial_bar_v0",axial_bar_v0);
260
261 //Reading TVB test parameters
262 pp.query("tvb_v0",tvb_v0);
263 pp.query("tvb_L",tvb_L);
264 pp.query("tvb_E",tvb_E);
265 pp.query("tvb_rho",tvb_rho);
266
267 pp.query("p2g_L",p2g_L);
268 pp.query("p2g_f",p2g_f);
269 pp.query("p2g_ncell",p2g_ncell);
270
271 pp.query("mem_compaction_area",mem_compaction_area);
272 pp.query("mem_compaction_dampcoeff",mem_compaction_dampcoeff);
273 pp.query("mem_compaction_restoring_force_calc_method",mem_compaction_restoring_force_calc_method);
274
275 pp.query("spring_alone_area",spring_alone_area);
276 pp.query("spring_alone_length",spring_alone_length);
277 pp.query("spring_alone_E",spring_alone_E);
278
279
280
281 if(!use_autogen)
282 {
283 particlefilename="mpm_particles.dat";
284 pp.query("particle_file",particlefilename);
285 }
286 else
287 {
288 pp.getarr("mincoords_autogen",autogen_mincoords);
289 pp.getarr("maxcoords_autogen",autogen_maxcoords);
290 pp.getarr("vel_autogen",autogen_vel);
291 pp.query("constmodel_autogen",autogen_constmodel);
292 pp.query("dens_autogen",autogen_dens);
293 pp.query("E_autogen",autogen_constmodel);
294 pp.query("nu_autogen",autogen_constmodel);
295 pp.query("bulkmod_autogen",autogen_bulkmod);
296 pp.query("Gama_pres_autogen",autogen_Gama_pres);
297 pp.query("visc_autogen",autogen_visc);
298 pp.query("multi_part_per_cell_autogen",autogen_multi_part_per_cell);
299 }
300
301 pp.query("fixed_timestep",fixed_timestep);
302 pp.query("stress_update_scheme",stress_update_scheme);
303 if(fixed_timestep==1)
304 {
305 pp.get("timestep", timestep);
306 }
307 else
308 {
309 timestep =0.0;
310 }
311
312 pp.query("alpha_pic_flip",alpha_pic_flip);
313 pp.query("dt_max_limit",dt_max_limit);
314 pp.query("dt_min_limit",dt_min_limit);
315 pp.query("CFL",CFL);
316
317 pp.query("applied_strainrate",applied_strainrate);
318 applied_strainrate_time=final_time;
319 pp.query("applied_strainrate_time",applied_strainrate_time);
320
321 pp.query("order_scheme",order_scheme);
322 pp.query("mass_tolerance",mass_tolerance);
323
324 pp.query("phasefield_output",phasefield_output);
325 pp.query("phasefield_smoothfactor",phasefield_smoothfactor);
326 pp.query("phasefield_gridratio",phasefield_gridratio);
327
328 pp.query("external_loads",external_loads_present);
329 if(external_loads_present)
330 {
331 pp.get("force_slab_lo", force_slab_lo);
332 pp.get("force_slab_hi", force_slab_hi);
333 pp.get("extforce", extforce);
334 }
335 pp.query("print_diagnostics",print_diagnostics);
336
337 //by default it is periodic
338 bclo[0]=BC_SLIPWALL;
339 bclo[1]=BC_SLIPWALL;
340 bclo[2]=BC_SLIPWALL;
341
342 bchi[0]=BC_SLIPWALL;
343 bchi[1]=BC_SLIPWALL;
344 bchi[2]=BC_SLIPWALL;
345
346 pp.queryarr("bc_lower",bclo);
347 pp.queryarr("bc_upper",bchi);
348
349 pp.query("levelset_bc",levelset_bc);
350 pp.query("levelset_wall_mu",levelset_wall_mu);
351
352
353 pp.query("wall_mu_lo",wall_mu_lo);
354 pp.query("wall_mu_hi",wall_mu_hi);
355
356 for(int i=0;i<AMREX_SPACEDIM*AMREX_SPACEDIM;i++)
357 {
358 wall_vel_lo[i]=0.0;
359 wall_vel_hi[i]=0.0;
360 }
361
362 pp.query("wall_vel_lo",wall_vel_lo);
363 pp.query("wall_vel_hi",wall_vel_hi);
364 }
365
366 std::string Convert_arr_string(Array<Real,AMREX_SPACEDIM>arr)
367 {
368 std::string str;
369 str="[";
370 for (int i=0;i<AMREX_SPACEDIM-1;i++)
371 {
372 str=str+std::to_string(arr[i])+",";
373 }
374 str=str+std::to_string(arr[AMREX_SPACEDIM-1]);
375 return(str);
376 }
377
378 void PrintSimulationParams()
379 {
380 //To be completed, Sreejith
381 std::string vect_str;
382 vect_str=Convert_arr_string(plo);
383 amrex::Print()<<"\n\tBackground grid physical extents: "<<vect_str;
384 }
385 void ThreeDOF_Solver(amrex::Real dt)
386 {
387 for (int i=0;i<no_of_rigidbodies_present;i++)
388 {
389 if(Rb[i].position_update_method==1)
390 {
391 for(int j=0;j<AMREX_SPACEDIM;j++)
392 {
393 Rb[i].velocity[j]+=(Rb[i].force_internal[j]+Rb[i].force_external[j])/Rb[i].total_mass*dt;
394 }
395 }
396 else
397 {
398 for(int j=0;j<AMREX_SPACEDIM;j++)
399 {
400 Rb[i].velocity[j]=Rb[i].imposed_velocity[j];
401 }
402 }
403 }
404 }
405
406};
407
